hero.title: MetaDoc
hero.subtitle: Intelligent Text Processing Software Based on LLM Agent
hero.description: A versatile intelligent document processing platform for students and IT professionals

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Powerful features to make document processing easier

docEdit.title: Document Editing
docEdit.desc: Support Markdown and LaTeX editing with real-time preview and syntax highlighting

ai.title: AI Intelligence
ai.desc: Multi-agent system based on LLM Agent, RAG knowledge base, intelligent dialogue and proofreading

export.title: Multi-format Export
export.desc: Support export to MD, HTML, DOCX, PDF, TEX and other formats

visualization.title: Data Visualization
visualization.desc: Professional chart drawing including UML, flowcharts, mind maps, word clouds

intelligent.title: Intelligent
intelligent.desc: Multi-agent architecture based on LLM Agent for precise context analysis and deep proofreading

efficient.title: Efficient
efficient.desc: Support AI concurrent task processing, can generate large amounts of content in a short time

professional.title: Professional
professional.desc: Native support for professional charts such as UML, mind maps, flowcharts

compatible.title: Compatible
compatible.desc: Support Markdown, LaTeX and other document formats, compatible with multiple operating system platforms

download.title: Download MetaDoc
download.subtitle: Choose the version that suits you

footer.description: Intelligent text processing software based on LLM Agent

about.noUpdateDesc: You are using the latest version

descriptions.home: The Home view displays document overview information, including document structure and recent editing history. You can quickly browse and manage your documents here.
descriptions.editor: The Editor view provides powerful Markdown editing capabilities with real-time preview, syntax highlighting, auto-completion, and more, making document editing more efficient.
descriptions.outline: The Outline view displays the document's hierarchical structure in a tree format, helping you quickly navigate and locate content, especially suitable for editing and managing long documents.
descriptions.latex: The LaTeX editor supports professional mathematical formula editing and typesetting, providing real-time PDF preview, syntax highlighting, auto-compilation, and more, ideal for academic writing.
descriptions.visualize: Visualization features support professional chart drawing including UML, flowcharts, mind maps, word clouds, and more. Full features require downloading the desktop version.
descriptions.agent: AI Agent features provide intelligent dialogue, document analysis, intelligent proofreading, and other AI-assisted functions. Full features require downloading the desktop version.
descriptions.proofread: Intelligent proofreading can automatically detect errors in documents and provide modification suggestions. Full features require downloading the desktop version.
descriptions.knowledgeBase: Knowledge Base features support RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) to help you build and manage knowledge bases. Full features require downloading the desktop version.

exampleLatexContent.title: MetaDoc LaTeX Example Document
exampleLatexContent.author: MetaDoc Team
exampleLatexContent.abstract: This document demonstrates MetaDoc's complete support for LaTeX, including complex mathematical formulas, tables, charts, code blocks, and other elements. LaTeX is a professional document typesetting system widely used in academic papers, technical reports, and other scenarios.
exampleLatexContent.introductionContent: This document demonstrates MetaDoc's support for LaTeX. LaTeX is a professional document typesetting system widely used in academic papers, technical reports, and other scenarios.
exampleLatexContent.introductionContent2: This document will demonstrate the following:
exampleLatexContent.item1: Complex mathematical formulas and theorem environments
exampleLatexContent.feature1Content: MetaDoc supports complete LaTeX mathematical formula syntax, including inline and block-level formulas. For example,
exampleLatexContent.einsteinTheoremContent: For any object with mass $m$, its energy $E$ satisfies:
exampleLatexContent.einsteinTheoremNote: where $c$ is the speed of light.
exampleLatexContent.feature2Content: Supports complex mathematical expressions, such as integrals and series:
exampleLatexContent.importantMathResults: The following are some important mathematical results:
exampleLatexContent.gaussianIntegralContent: Equation \eqref{eq:gaussian} is known as the Gaussian integral and has important applications in probability theory and statistics.
exampleLatexContent.codeExampleIntro: The following is a Python code example:
exampleLatexContent.algorithmExampleIntro: The following is an algorithmic pseudocode example:
exampleLatexContent.algorithmStep2: Partition $A$ into three parts: $L = \{x | x < pivot}\$, $E = \{x | x = pivot}\$, $R = \{x | x > pivot}\$
exampleLatexContent.graphicsExampleIntro: A graphics example drawn using TikZ:
exampleLatexContent.multicolIntro: Here is an example of a multi-column layout:
exampleLatexContent.column1Content: LaTeX is a professional document typesetting system developed by Leslie Lamport. It is based on the TeX typesetting system and provides higher-level commands for document structure.
exampleLatexContent.column2Content: MetaDoc offers full LaTeX support, including syntax highlighting, real-time preview, and auto-completion, enabling you to efficiently write LaTeX documents.
exampleLatexContent.physicsFormulasIntro: Here are some physics formula examples:
exampleLatexContent.physicsFormulasExplanation: Equation \eqref{eq:newton} is Newton's second law, Equation \eqref{eq:energy} is the mechanical energy formula, and Equation \eqref{eq:maxwell} is one of Maxwell's equations.
exampleLatexContent.chemistryFormulasIntro: Here are some chemistry formula examples:
exampleLatexContent.continuousFunctionDef: Let a function $f: \mathbb{R} \to \mathbb{R}$. If for any $x_0 \in \mathbb{R}$, we have
exampleLatexContent.continuousFunctionConclusion: then $f$ is said to be continuous at $x_0$.
exampleLatexContent.meanValueTheoremContent: If a function $f$ is continuous on the closed interval $[a, b]$ and differentiable on the open interval $(a, b)$, then there exists some $c \in (a, b)$ such that
exampleLatexContent.meanValueTheoremExample: Consider the function $f(x) = x^2$ on the interval $[0, 2]$. According to the Mean Value Theorem, there exists $c \in (0, 2)$ such that
exampleLatexContent.conclusionContent: MetaDoc provides complete LaTeX editing and compilation support, allowing you to easily create professional academic documents. This document demonstrates:
exampleLatexContent.conclusionItem1: Use of theorem environments (see Equation \eqref{eq:emc2} and Figure \ref{fig:functions})
exampleLatexContent.conclusionItem3: Table and code block presentations (see Table \ref{tab:example} and Algorithm \ref{alg:quicksort})
exampleLatexContent.corollaryContent: MetaDoc provides complete LaTeX editing and compilation support, allowing you to easily create professional academic documents.

dummy.description: To use the full features, please experience in the software. Download MetaDoc to start using all features.

exampleContent.title: MetaDoc - Intelligent Text Processing Software
exampleContent.subtitle: MetaDoc is an intelligent text processing software based on LLM Agent, designed for students and IT professionals. It's not just an editor, but a powerful document creation and knowledge management platform.
exampleContent.architectureDesc: MetaDoc adopts a modern layered architecture design to ensure system scalability and maintainability. The following is the overall architecture diagram:
exampleContent.intelligentDesc: MetaDoc adopts an advanced **multi-agent architecture** that can understand document context and provide accurate content suggestions and deep proofreading. Whether it's academic papers, technical documents, or daily notes, MetaDoc can help you improve writing efficiency.
exampleContent.intelligentFeature1: ü§ñ **AI Smart Completion**: Context-based intelligent content generation
exampleContent.intelligentFeature2: üìù **Deep Proofreading**: Not just spell checking, but also optimizing expression and logic
exampleContent.intelligentFeature3: üí° **Smart Suggestions**: Real-time writing suggestions and content optimization
exampleContent.visualizationDesc: MetaDoc natively supports various professional charts, making your documents more vivid and professional.
exampleContent.mermaidGanttDesc: Use Mermaid to create beautiful project progress Gantt charts, showcasing MetaDoc's development roadmap:
exampleContent.echartsDesc: Use ECharts to create beautiful data charts, showcasing project feature usage:
exampleContent.plantumlClassDesc: Use PlantUML to draw professional UML class diagrams, showcasing core class design:
exampleContent.textStylesDesc: MetaDoc supports rich Markdown syntax and LaTeX mathematical formulas, making your documents more professional.
exampleContent.codeHighlightDesc: Support syntax highlighting for multiple programming languages:
exampleContent.latexInlineExample: Inline formula example: $E = mc^2$, this is Einstein's mass-energy equation.
exampleContent.formatSupportDesc: MetaDoc supports multiple document formats to meet different scenario needs:
exampleContent.feature1Desc: When writing documents, the right side displays rendering effects in real-time, WYSIWYG.
exampleContent.feature2Desc: Automatically extract document outline, quickly jump to any section. Support drag-and-drop to adjust section order.
exampleContent.feature3Desc: Manage multiple documents like a browser, switch easily, improve work efficiency.
exampleContent.feature4Desc: Support light and dark themes, protect your eyes, adapt to different usage scenarios.
exampleContent.scenario2: üíª **Technical Documentation**: API docs, development manuals, technical blogs
exampleContent.scenario3: üìù **Daily Notes**: Study notes, meeting records, to-do lists
exampleContent.scenario4: üéì **Education & Training**: Course materials, teaching slides, student assignments
exampleContent.why1: 1. **üöÄ Efficient & Convenient**: AI-assisted writing, greatly improving creation efficiency
exampleContent.why2: 2. **üé® Professional & Beautiful**: Rich charts and styles, making documents more professional
exampleContent.why3: 3. **üîí Secure & Reliable**: Local storage, data security guaranteed
exampleContent.futureDesc: MetaDoc will continue to optimize and update, and will support in the future:
exampleContent.footer: **Start using MetaDoc and experience the charm of intelligent document processing!** üéâ
exampleContent.footerNote: *This document is written using MetaDoc, showcasing its powerful features and beautiful chart support.*
